website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for puppies who deal with tummy troubles when they’re stressed due to the probiotics-packed yogurt drizzled over each sweet snack.
pros: Probiotics help to soothe upset digestive systems
Healthy ingredients like cranberries and banana

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These treats aren't the best, they have no "chill out" effects at all on my pups. My puppy carried this treat around in her mouth for 1 min and the yogurt on top of melted on to the top of her mouth and she panicked as she thought it was stuck. Cute looking cookies though, but they are just okay flavor wise. My dogs prefer other treats over these.
customer_reviews.author: Brock & Jess

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: my dogs developed food allergies.... try not to feed them treats...these have no grains... they seem to be doing well..
customer_reviews.author: LadyBags

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight but very warm wool socks. They machine washed and dried nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia McNeil

customer_reviews.title: My little dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: I am presuming the flavor is good since he seems to really enjoy these and help keep him calm. He's a rescue fur baby from a horrible situation so thankfully it's all about him now.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I have been buying these in the past and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these in the past and have had no problems. So I bought 3 of these and 2 of them had maggots when I opened the packs today. Expiration listed is still 09/22/16.
customer_reviews.author: MVic

customer_reviews.title: Dog will eat them if I put some peanut butter ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog will eat them if I put some peanut butter on it. They seem to chill her out a little.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Dogs favorite treats!
customer_reviews.text: Our pups get the “chill out” biscuits before bed and this is their cue for bed time. They LOVE these treats! I love that there’s a probiotic glaze on the treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dog’s Absolute Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely adores these. They used to be sold at our local pet store but disappeared from the shelves quite some time ago. I was happy to find these on Amazon. My pup’s eyes lit up as soon as she saw the bag and took and first whiff. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES all the yopup varieties and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: D. Strobl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our dog absolutely LOVES these biscuits....and we don't feel guilty giving them to her!!
customer_reviews.author: EO

customer_reviews.title: Product is spoiled
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three bags because they are my dog's favorite. Two of the three bags had bugs and worms in them. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved these! They calmed my puppy down at bedtime!

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dog treats by far.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. I like that they have yogurt on/in them

customer_reviews.author: K.Bignell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Petsmart used to carry them but no longer.
customer_reviews.author: S Hendershott

customer_reviews.title: Our Boston Terrier really likes these treats. They also ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Boston Terrier really likes these treats. They also seem to help with her gas. We do wish they had larger packages and would go back to the bone shaped treat. I know the shape is just a novelty but our dog thought it was cute... (SMILE) We were getting them from PetSmart but they didn't always have them in stock. The price is about the same as PetSmart.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My dog was scared of everything. We started giving her these, and she has relaxed a lot. Will even way her tail at strangers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog Shiloh got these as a gift from my brother.When they ran out I bought more.They don't upset her stomach,since she is very sensitive to everything.She enjoys the biscuits very much.I just wish they came in a bigger bag.
customer_reviews.author: bookaddict44

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great treats! Our dogs love them. Easy & good for their stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Good Treat
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these! Not sure if they calmed him down as I did not have a chance to watch him after I gave him a couple. I feel good feeding my dog healthy treats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been this treat for my little girl for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying lthis treat for my little girl for a few years, she gets 1 a day on top of her dry food. It's always the first thing that she eats. The five star rating comes from her.
customer_reviews.author: AN OLD GUY

customer_reviews.title: Very popular with my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Pups love the variety of treats that YoPup produces. I love them being wheat free.

product_meta.title: Yoghund YoPup Chill Out Dog Biscuits
product_meta.description: Size:7 ozYoPup biscuits are created to be a delicious and nutritious super treat that supports the entire wellbeing of your pet. Yopup biscuits have active cultures in a yummy yogurt icing with the highest quality, antioxidant rich ingredients. Pomegranates, raspberries and walnuts make this a delicious and wholesome treat for your dog. Yogurt and live probiotics make it a super treat that supports optimal health. These naturally preserved biscuits with active probiotic cultures are the perfect natural and healthy treat for your dog or puppy. YoPup is vitamin fortified and good for all life stages. There are 4 Functional Varieties a Different Probiotic Blend in Each to Address Specific Conditions. YoPup Less Stress, would you consider your dog to be calm, cool and collected? It's not always easy to calm them down, but you can help manage the effects of such stress with the regular intake of carefully selected probiotics. Less stress is designed to help manage the effects of stress.
feature_bullets: An All Natural Wheat Free Premium Biscuit
Yummy Yogurt Icing And Live Probiotics In Every Bite
Helps Manage The Effects Of Stress
